bio.text: Despite his name, Black Dwarf is a massive alien and brutal follower of Thanos and his  Black Order, and he'll do whatever it takes to accomplish his master's evil goals. Helping him to that end, Black Dwarf possesses impenetrable skin, and superhuman strength, durability and stamina, making him a feared battle opponent. To match his awesome size, Black Dwarf wields massive bladed and blunt force weapons.
bio.locText: Despite his name, Black Dwarf is a massive alien and brutal follower of Thanos and his  Black Order, and he'll do whatever it takes to accomplish his master's evil goals. Helping him to that end, Black Dwarf possesses impenetrable skin, and superhuman strength, durability and stamina, making him a feared battle opponent. To match his awesome size, Black Dwarf wields massive bladed and blunt force weapons.

bio.text: As a prominent member of the Black Order, Ebony Maw can be found in the devoted service of Thanos, his adoptive father. Rather than physical strength. Maw is gifted with a genius-level intellect and the abilities of telepathy, telekinesis, mind control and flight. He often uses his intellect and persuasive voice to masterfully manipulate and control even the strongest minds, leading to being described as 'a black tongue that spreads mischief and evil wherever he goes'. But his allegiances prove fickle, as he turns on Thanos in favor of Thanos' offspring, Thane .. ultimately turning him too.
bio.locText: As a prominent member of the Black Order, Ebony Maw can be found in the devoted service of Thanos, his adoptive father. Rather than physical strength. Maw is gifted with a genius-level intellect and the abilities of telepathy, telekinesis, mind control and flight. He often uses his intellect and persuasive voice to masterfully manipulate and control even the strongest minds, leading to being described as 'a black tongue that spreads mischief and evil wherever he goes'. But his allegiances prove fickle, as he turns on Thanos in favor of Thanos' offspring, Thane .. ultimately turning him too.

bio.text: A member of a world Thanos destroyed, Proxima Midnight was taken by Thanos and raised as his own daughter. Considered one of the fiercest warriors in the universe, Proxima Midnight travels the world with her deadly spear - forged by Thanos himself and marked by its tip of a star trapped in a quantum singularity - making her one of Thanos' most feared allies. But her strengths aren't limited to her spear, which never misses and kills anyone it pierces. She also possesses superhuman strength, speed and endurance.
bio.locText: A member of a world Thanos destroyed, Proxima Midnight was taken by Thanos and raised as his own daughter. Considered one of the fiercest warriors in the universe, Proxima Midnight travels the world with her deadly spear - forged by Thanos himself and marked by its tip of a star trapped in a quantum singularity - making her one of Thanos' most feared allies. But her strengths aren't limited to her spear, which never misses and kills anyone it pierces. She also possesses superhuman strength, speed and endurance.

bio.text: Perhaps the most feared being in the cosmos, the mad titan Thanos is a nihilist of the highest order. His sole ambition is to return the universe to what he believes is its natural state - oblivion. Growing in power and infamy as he traverses the stars, Thanos regularly causes wanton destruction and leaves a devastating swath of chaos in his wake, often seeking out terrifying sources of cosmic power, like the legendary Infinity Stones, in an effort to see all of existence tremble in his shadow.
bio.locText: Perhaps the most feared being in the cosmos, the mad titan Thanos is a nihilist of the highest order. His sole ambition is to return the universe to what he believes is its natural state - oblivion. Growing in power and infamy as he traverses the stars, Thanos regularly causes wanton destruction and leaves a devastating swath of chaos in his wake, often seeking out terrifying sources of cosmic power, like the legendary Infinity Stones, in an effort to see all of existence tremble in his shadow.
